00042 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_compare
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     bool operator()( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const ValueBase &/*second*/ )const {
00046         LOG( Debug, error ) << "comparison of " << Value<T>::staticName() << " is not supportet";
00047         return false;
00048     }
00049 };
00050 
00061 template<typename T> class type_compare<T, true>
00062 {
00063 protected:
00064     virtual bool posOverflow( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const Value<T> &/*second*/ )const {return false;} //default to false
00065     virtual bool negOverflow( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const Value<T> &/*second*/ )const {return false;} //default to false
00066     virtual bool inRange( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const Value<T> &/*second*/ )const {return false;} //default to false
00067 public:
00068     bool operator()( const Value<T> &first, const ValueBase &second )const {
00069         // ask second for a converter from itself to Value<T>
00070         const ValueBase::Converter conv = second.getConverterTo( Value<T>::staticID );
00071 
00072         if ( conv ) {
00073             //try to convert second into T and handle results
00074             Value<T> buff;
00075 
00076             switch ( conv->convert( second, buff ) ) {
00077             case boost::numeric::cPosOverflow:
00078                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Positive overflow when converting " << second.toString( true ) << " to " << Value<T>::staticName() << ".";
00079                 return posOverflow( first, buff );
00080             case boost::numeric::cNegOverflow:
00081                 LOG( Debug, info ) << "Negative overflow when converting " << second.toString( true ) << " to " << Value<T>::staticName() << ".";
00082                 return negOverflow( first, buff );
00083             case boost::numeric::cInRange:
00084                 return inRange( first, buff );
00085             }
00086         } else {
00087             LOG( Debug, error ) << "No conversion of " << second.getTypeName() << " to " << Value<T>::staticName() << " available";
00088             return false;
00089         }
00090 
00091         return false;
00092     }
00093     virtual ~type_compare() {}
00094 };
00095 
00096 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_less : public type_compare<T, isNumber> {};// we are going to specialize this for numeric T below
00097 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_greater : public type_compare<T, isNumber> {};
00098 template<typename T, bool isNumber> class type_eq : public type_compare<T, isNumber>
00099 {
00100 protected:
00101     bool inRange( const Value<T> &first, const Value<T> &second )const {
00102         return ( T )first == ( T )second;
00103     }
00104 };
00105 
00107 template<typename T> class type_less<T, true> : public type_compare<T, true>
00108 {
00109 protected:
00110     bool posOverflow( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const Value<T> &/*second*/ )const {
00111         return true; //getting an positive overflow when trying to convert second into T, obviously means first is less
00112     }
00113     bool inRange( const Value<T> &first, const Value<T> &second )const {
00114         return ( T )first < ( T )second;
00115     }
00116 };
00117 
00119 template<typename T> class type_greater<T, true> : public type_compare<T, true>
00120 {
00121 protected:
00122     bool negOverflow( const Value<T> &/*first*/, const Value<T> &/*second*/ )const {
00123         return true; //getting an negative overflow when trying to convert second into T, obviously means first is greater
00124     }
00125     bool inRange( const Value<T> &first, const Value<T> &second )const {
00126         return ( T )first > ( T )second;
00127     }
00128 };

00144 template<typename TYPE> class Value: public _internal::ValueBase
00145 {
00146     TYPE m_val;
00147     static const char m_typeName[];
00148 protected:
00149     ValueBase *clone() const {
00150         return new Value<TYPE>( *this );
00151     }
00152 public:
00153     static const unsigned short staticID = _internal::TypeID<TYPE>::value;
00154     Value() {
00155         BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_RELATION( staticID, < , 0xFF );
00156         checkType<TYPE>();
00157     }
00163     template<typename T> Value( const T &value ) {
00164         m_val = _internal::__cast_to<TYPE>()( this, value );
00165         BOOST_MPL_ASSERT_RELATION( staticID, < , 0xFF );
00166         checkType<TYPE>();
00167     }
00168     std::string toString( bool labeled = false )const {
00169         std::string ret;
00170         Reference ref = copyToNewByID( Value<std::string>::staticID );
00171 
00172         if ( ref.isEmpty() ) {
00173             LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Automatic conversion of " << *this << " to string failed. Falling back to boost::lexical_cast<std::string>";
00174             ret = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>( m_val );
00175         } else {
00176             ret = ref->castTo<std::string>();
00177         }
00178 
00179         if ( labeled )ret += "(" + staticName() + ")";
00180 
00181         return ret;
00182     }
00183     virtual std::string getTypeName()const {
00184         return staticName();
00185     }
00186     virtual unsigned short getTypeID()const {
00187         return staticID;
00188     }
00189 
00191     virtual bool operator==( const ValueBase &second )const {
00192         if ( second.is<TYPE>() ) {
00193             return m_val == second.castTo<TYPE>();
00194         } else
00195             return  false;
00196     }
00197 
00199     static std::string staticName() {return m_typeName;}
00200 
00212     operator const TYPE&()const {return m_val;}
00213 
00225     operator TYPE&() {return m_val;}
00226 
00236     bool gt( const _internal::ValueBase &ref )const {
00237         return _internal::type_greater<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00238     }
00239 
00249     bool lt( const _internal::ValueBase &ref )const {
00250         return _internal::type_less<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00251     }
00252 
00262     bool eq( const _internal::ValueBase &ref )const {
00263         return _internal::type_eq<TYPE, boost::is_arithmetic<TYPE>::value >()( *this, ref );
00264     }
00265 
00266     virtual ~Value() {}
00267 };

00269 template<typename T> const Value<T>& _internal::ValueBase::castToType() const
00270 {
00271     checkType<T>();
00272     return m_cast_to<Value<T> >();
00273 }
00274 template<typename T> const T &_internal::ValueBase::castTo() const
00275 {
00276     const Value<T> &ret = castToType<T>();
00277     return ret.operator const T & ();
00278 }
00279 template<typename T> Value<T>& _internal::ValueBase::castToType()
00280 {
00281     checkType<T>();
00282     return m_cast_to<Value<T> >();
00283 }
00284 template<typename T> T &_internal::ValueBase::castTo()
00285 {
00286     Value<T> &ret = castToType<T>();
00287     return ret.operator T & ();
00288 }

00290 template<typename T> bool _internal::ValueBase::is()const
00291 {
00292     checkType<T>();
00293     return getTypeID() == Value<T>::staticID;
00294 }
